description:
Hazamaya Kana is a girl who lost her bag and asks Judgement for help. Misaka, mistakingly thinks the bag is related to the recent graviton explosions case, leading her to a wild-goose chase.
The girl later appears once again in the Seventh Mist shopping centre, where Kaitabi Hatsuya plans to detonate his next bomb. Her, Misaka and Uiharu are saved by Touma`s Imagine Breaker in the occuring explosion.
name: Hazamaya Kana
